name: scss-boilerplate
description: SCSS boilerplate with common functions, mixins, helpers, patterns, variables and external libraries

scripts.sassdoc: ./node_modules/.bin/sassdoc src/ --dest ./sassdoc --config=.sassdocrc && echo 'Documentation successfully generated in sassdoc/index.html'
scripts.sasstodocs: ./node_modules/.bin/sassdoc src/ --dest ./docs --config=.sassdocrc && echo 'Documentation successfully generated in docs/index.html'

author: Filip Vanden Eynde
